name: Crave Box - April 2013
description:
The Crave Box - a monthly subscription for Canadian artisan gourmet food. That's right, Canadian food, made in large part by small producers who put their heart and soul into each unique flavor or product they offer. Discover what's available north of the border. A different selection each month, representing different parts of each province. 

The April Crave Box - mushroom coconut rice, roasted garlic jelly, apple butter BBQ sauce, butternut crunch (popcorn with fresh roasted almonds and pecans, coated in old fashioned style butter toffee), and fresh fudge.

Deadline to order: April 1, 2013

name: Fudge Variety Pack
description: Fresh fudge made by hand in small batches. Always creamy and delicious. Six classic flavors included: chocolate, chocolate walnut, maple, maple walnut, rocky road, and s'mores.
